price: ߝߏ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߓߊ߯ ߕߟߏߡߊߟߐ ߛߏ߲߬ߧߊ߫ ، ߕߊߟߏߟߏ߫ ߝߢߊߢߊߢߊ ߘߏ߫ ߘߴߏ߬ ߛߊ߯ߘߊ߫
arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā mani is'taraqa al-samʿa fa-atbaʿahu shihābun mubīnun
